stated_problem: Need a lightweight in-memory task tracker with status transitions and a health check endpoint
root_need: Ship features safely with autonomous coding and tests

features.name: Task CRUD
features.description: Create, read, update, and delete tasks stored in a Python dict. Each task has an id, title, status (pending/in_progress/done), and created_at timestamp.

features.name: Health Endpoint
features.description: A simple function that returns a dict with status=healthy, task_count, and uptime_seconds.
